name: Unlife Current
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Aquatic Adventures © 2017, Paizo Inc.
area: current or portion of current up to 20 feet wide and 100 feet long
text: This functions as life current except you infuse the current with negative energy, so it heals undead and harms living creatures.
area_zh: 海流或者一部分海流，最宽不超过20呎，最长不超过100呎
text_zh: 该法术的效果和生命之潮的效果类似，除了你向海流中注入的是负能量，所以该法术能治愈不死生物而伤害活物。
